0.name: Pari (1995)

But it...

Molly is expecting her first ...

Is there anything positive to be said about infidelity, or does it simply deserve the utmost contempt, particularly wh...

It's just another day ...

It stoically puts up with its guests, and their misguided efforts to control their own destinies, until the very end when it too has had enough...

In the lat...

The family physician also objects because of the result such a match would mean on the children, but Helen's parents laugh at these new-fangled notions. The doctor then appeals to Alving, who ...

Will Dinesh find his true love in Poornima (Nanditha), the girl who had rejected him once, is now back in his life? The film is directed by Pa. Ranjith, former assistant of well-known fil...

2297.plot: A California couple and a survivalist encounter Leatherface and his family.

After his release from prison, Glimmie plans his revenge...

2301.name: Ijé (2010)
2301.plot: Unprecedented in scope, "Ijé" tells a tale of Chioma, a child growing up in the Nigerian countryside, who warns her restless sister Anya about the trappings of the American dream. Ten years later, Anya is accused of killing three men in a Hollywood Hills mansion--including her record-producer husband. Chioma travels from Nigeria to Los Angeles and, with the help of a ...

2346.plot: A former tennis star arranges the murder of his adulterous wife.

2356.name: Hoodlum (1997)

2358.name: Reel Horror (1985)

But nobody knows that in reality this conventional and cheerful young man is in fact an agent of the GPU (Soviet Secret Service) and has been sent to assassinate Trotsky.

2360.name: Shane (1953)
2360.plot: A weary gunfighter in 1880s Wyoming begins to envision a quieter life after befriending a homestead family with a young son who idolizes him, but a smoldering range war forces him to act.

2362.name: When the Bough Breaks (2016)

There she meets a litigious farmer who fights against the banks and the government, in which she will be somehow involved. Meanwhile, practising her theories, she makes some old men very happy and, by chance even passes as a saint!

2365.name: Forgetting the Girl (2012)
2365.plot: Haunted by a traumatic history, photographer Kevin Wolfe (Christopher Denham) struggles to systematically forget all his bad memories, but erasing his past threatens to consume his future. Kevin is obsessed with finding a girl who can help him forget his unpleasant past. However, all his encounters with the opposite sex inevitably go afoul, creating more awkward exper...

2366.name: Out of Africa (1985)

2368.name: Guess Who (2005)

2369.name: Armageddon (1997)

2370.name: John Wick (2014)
2370.plot: An ex-hit-man comes out of retirement to track down the gangsters that killed his dog and took everything from him.

2371.name: Down to Earth (2001)
2371.plot: After dying before his time, an aspiring black comic gets a second shot at life - by being placed in the body of a wealthy white businessman.

2372.name: High Sierra (1941)

2374.name: The Rundown (2003)

2375.plot: The Garrisons live with a Great Dane who thinks he's a dainty dachshund. His identity crisis results in an uproarious series of household crises that reduce the Garrisons' house to shambles.

When one of the teens is captured, those who remain - a group that includes the cop who put a bullet in Goodnight's head four years ago - band together to survive against the brutal killer.

2378.name: Wings of Fame (1990)
2378.plot: A famous movie actor (Peter O'Toole) claims that he has written a book. As result, a real author, not a very well known writer, vengenfully kills him but then dies as a result of an accident. Next, they both find themselves in after-life, where souls of all famous people are gathered.

2379.name: The Manchurian Candidate (2004)

Upon reaching a town where they traditionally stop for a few months and work in vineyards, they learn that a new law forbids them from being nomadic. Theodore, the town's mayor, and Miss Lundi, th...

But his fascination with an unsolved murder leads him into a spiral of chaos as he is forced to play cat-and-mouse with a clever killer and an overambitious detective, while at the same time lusting after another woman.

2537.plot: In the future, a kickboxer and a robot lead a revolution against ruling cyborgs.

2607.name: Easy Rider: The Ride Back (2012)
2607.plot: In this revisionist drama, the film delves into the family lineage of Wyatt Williams, the character made famous by Peter Fonda in the original Easy Rider Movie. Centering around the Williams family, and their internal family struggles throughout the eras of the 40's to present day, as they struggle to connect with one another through the only way they know how. Their ...

2608.name: Venom (2014)
2608.plot: Spit'in Anger is the exploration into the uncharted space of fatherlessness. Through the story of one of America's premier leaders in the responsible fatherhood movement--Kenneth Braswell--we learn that the filmmaker and healer is about to receive a lesson in healing himself. Experts Dr. Jeff Gardere, Iyanla Vanzant. Judge Mablean Ephriam and Terrie Williams lay the f...

2609.plot: A Midwesterner becomes fascinated with his nouveau riche neighbor, who obsesses over his lost love.

Frederik is an up-and-coming young bank employee who lives an ordinary life. When a bank customer, whom Frederik has denied a loan in the face of the bank crisis, shoots himself in front of Frederik, he snaps. Together with ex-con Vince,he...

2611.plot: Ponyland comes under attack from the Smooze, a massive purple ooze created by an evil witch who plans to destroy the ponies' annual spring festival.

2623.plot: This is the power of the unbelievable treasure, the "God Eye." Searching for it, the Gokaigers meet up with the "Ghost Ship" and board it. 2638.name: Deck the Halls (2005)

2640.name: Dark Vengeance (1993)
2640.plot: Welcome to Planet Earth. It hos become o barren wasteland of greed and violence. A savage world of unspeakable cruelty. In a world torn by raging electrical storm's and ram pant with deadly cancers, there is only one escape: "the seeds" , a powerful hallucinogenic drug that provides great pleasure... and eventual madness. The Drug lords who control "the seeds" - contr...

2641.name: From Prada to Nada (2011)
2641.plot: A Latina spin on Jane Austen's "Sense and Sensibility": two spoiled sisters who have been left penniless after their father's sudden death are forced to move in with their estranged aunt in East Los Angeles.

Alice has been overheard threatening to kill Barrow rather than give in to his advances. She protests her innocence, but the District Attorney doesn't believe her and charges her with Barrow's murder. However, things aren't quite as cut-and-dried as the D.A. ...

2669.plot: Los Angeles is under attack by monsters. The mechs attempting to fight them off are better armed than their precursors, but so are the creatures.

Seth Delray knew the possibilities before he moved his wife and two kids into the old jailhouse, but the Sheriff assured him that it would take...

Upon waking the next morning Matt discovers that his mind has some how be transferred into Karen's body...and that the being...

A new CBI officer (Raymond De Souza) from Mumbai has b...

3137.name: Paper Planes (2015)

3138.name: The Village (2004)
3138.plot: A series of events tests the beliefs of a small isolated countryside village.

3140.plot: The Bride continues her quest of vengeance against her former boss and lover Bill, the reclusive bouncer Budd, and the treacherous, one-eyed Elle.

3141.plot: Dr. Mithun Madhavan uncovering the murder mystery in a joint family and how he helps Dhwani overcome from some disturbing experiences.

3161.name: Cast Away (2000)

Using 2.5D Parallax technology, nearly 400 immersive scenes were painstakingly constructed from archival photos to create a compelling and emotional experience for viewers.

3248.name: W.W. and the Dixie Dancekings (1975)
3248.plot: W. Bright (Burt Reynolds) is a robber with a heart of gold who travels the South knocking off banks and gas stations owned by a corrupt businessman. When he hijacks a car, he meets an aspiring country band, the Dixie Dancekings, led by Dixie (Conny Van Dyke). The two sides eventually take a liking to one another, especially after the Dancekings realize the size of Bri...

3250.name: Thy Womb (2012)
3250.plot: An infertile midwife and her husband find a surrogate mother so that they can have a child.

3265.name: The Bourne Supremacy (2004)
3265.plot: When Jason Bourne is framed for a CIA operation gone awry, he is forced to resume his former life as a trained assassin to survive.

3266.name: The Paperboy (2012)
3266.plot: A reporter returns to his Florida hometown to investigate a case involving a death row inmate.

3267.name: Speed 2: Cruise Control (1997)

3269.name: Madagascar (2005)

3274.plot: Biopic of Russian ice hockey legend Valeri Kharlamov from early childhood, rising to the pinnacle of the sport and his untimely death.

3275.name: Rock of Ages (2012)
3275.plot: A small-town girl and a city boy meet on the Sunset Strip while pursuing their Hollywood dreams.

3276.name: I.T.
3276.plot: A millionaire has his life turned upside down after firing his I.T. consultant.

3277.name: War and Peace (2002)
3277.plot: The danger of a nuclear conflict between India and Pakistan.

3280.name: The Last Dinosaur (1977)

But her boyfriend, Doctor Jeff Rosenberg, realizes she is under the influence of a vampire, and tries h...

We get to learn a lot about the family's background, and secrets are revealed. If you look behind the curtain, they've got a whole other story to tell than what it looks from the outs...

The fil...

The Rascals try anything to raise the money needed to save their grandma's (Doris Roberts) bakery. The only trouble is - they can't seem to do anything right! From botched pet washes to terrible ...

The search for the non-existent husband takes them to several cities, with Besozzi finally realizing he loves her. But it is not until he gets involved in a...

Alas, keeping the secret means sending Constance, lover of D'Artagnan, off t...

Didn't he go for a 2099 km drive all the way from Buenos Aires to Pata...

Dan Choi, Frank DiCaro, Mike Ruiz and Varla Jean Merman, lend their support to our lovable gang as ...

4769.plot: In 1980 Miami, a determined Cuban immigrant takes over a drug cartel and succumbs to greed.

4770.name: Sinister (2012)
4770.plot: Washed-up true crime writer Ellison Oswalt finds a box of super 8 home movies in his new home, revealing that the murder he is currently researching is the work of a serial killer whose legacy dates back to the 1960s.

4771.name: The Pursuit of Happiness (1934)
4771.plot: Lederer is a Hessian soldier who defects to the Americans during the Revolutionary War.He falls in love with a Yankee girl, but a thuggish local militiaman jealously makes things hard for him while he's a prisoner of war.

4772.name: Insidious (2010)
4772.plot: A family looks to prevent evil spirits from trapping their comatose child in a realm called The Further.

4773.name: Fantasia (2004)
4773.plot: A wizard faces ridicule when she is magically summoned in 1960s Hong Kong by a trio of bumbling detectives.

4774.name: Two for the Road (1967)
4774.plot: A couple in the south of France non-sequentially spin down the highways of infidelity in their troubled ten-year marriage.

4775.name: Remember the Titans (2000)
4775.plot: The true story of a newly appointed African-American coach and his high school team on their first season as a racially integrated unit.

4776.name: A Day in the Death of Donny B (1969)
4776.plot: A heroin junkie goes looking for money for his next fix in Harlem, New York City.

4777.name: The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (2005)
4777.plot: Four kids travel through a wardrobe to the land of Narnia and learn of their destiny to free it with the guidance of a mystical lion.

4778.name: Sixteen Candles (1984)
4778.plot: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday becomes anything but special, as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

4779.name: R.I.P.D. (2013)
4779.plot: A recently slain cop joins a team of undead police officers working for the Rest in Peace Department and tries to find the man who murdered him.

4780.name: Fahrenheit 451 (1966)
4780.plot: In an oppressive future, a fireman whose duty is to destroy all books begins to question his task.

4781.name: Mission: Impossible – Ghost Protocol (2011)
4781.plot: The IMF is shut down when it's implicated in the bombing of the Kremlin, causing Ethan Hunt and his new team to go rogue to clear their organization's name.

4782.name: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest (1975)
4782.plot: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.

4783.name: Tiger (2015)
4783.plot: Tiger, an aggressive young man, can do just about anything for his best friend Vishnu. When Vishnu falls in love with Ganga, the lives of the lovers are in danger. Will Tiger be able to save them?

4784.name: Marvel Super Heroes 4D
4784.plot: The Marvel Super-Heroes (Spider-Man, Captain America, Iron Man, Hulk) arrive for a party at a deserted Buckingham Palace in London and are attacked by a giant robot.

4785.name: Earth to Echo (2014)
4785.plot: After receiving a bizarre series of encrypted messages, a group of kids embark on an adventure with an alien who needs their help.

4786.name: The Purge: Anarchy (2014)
4786.plot: Three groups of people intertwine and are left stranded in the streets on Purge Night, trying to survive the chaos and violence that occurs.

4787.name: Let's Scare Jessica to Death (1971)
4787.plot: A recently institutionalized woman has bizarre experiences after moving into a supposedly haunted country farmhouse and fears she may be losing her sanity once again.

4788.name: Pumpkinhead (1988)
4788.plot: After a tragic accident, a man conjures up a towering, vengeful demon called Pumpkinhead to destroy a group of unsuspecting teenagers.

4789.name: Bride and Prejudice (2004)
4789.plot: The arrival of wealthy bachelors in town causes an uproar when families with single daughters aggressively seek engagements, including the Bennet family, with five eligible daughters.

4790.name: High Tension (2003)
4790.plot: Best friends Marie and Alexia decide to spend a quiet weekend at Alexia's parents' secluded farmhouse. But on the night of their arrival, the girls' idyllic getaway turns into an endless night of horror.

4791.name: Pale Rider (1985)
4791.plot: A mysterious preacher (Clint Eastwood) protects a humble prospector village from a greedy mining company trying to encroach on their land.

4792.name: Men of Honor (2000)
4792.plot: The story of Carl Brashear, the first African-American U.S. Navy Diver, and the man who trained him.

4793.name: Personal Shopper (2016)
4793.plot: A personal shopper in Paris refuses to leave the city until she makes contact with her twin brother who previously died there. Her life becomes more complicated when a mysterious person contacts her via text message.

4794.name: Garfield Gets Real (2007)
4794.plot: Follow Garfield behind the scenes in Cartoon World where he grows bored with his life as a comic strip star.

4795.name: The Naked Gun: From the Files of Police Squad! (1988)
4795.plot: Incompetent police Detective Frank Drebin must foil an attempt to assassinate Queen Elizabeth II.

4796.name: ¡Three Amigos! (1986)
4796.plot: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

4797.name: Revolutionary Road (2008)
4797.plot: A young couple living in a Connecticut suburb during the mid-1950s struggle to come to terms with their personal problems while trying to raise their two children.

4798.name: Good Cheer (1926)
4798.plot: On Christmas Eve, the Gang copes with hardships, helps capture a gang of thieves, and learns that Santa Claus really exists for those who wish fervently enough.

4799.name: Limitless (2011)
4799.plot: A mysterious pill that enables the user to access 100% of his brain's abilities transforms a struggling writer into a financial wizard, but it also puts him in a new world with many dangers.

4800.name: Salmon Fishing in the Yemen (2011)
4800.plot: A fisheries expert is approached by a consultant to help realize a sheik's vision of bringing the sport of fly-fishing to the desert and embarks on an upstream journey of faith and fish to prove the impossible possible.

4801.name: Signs (2008)
4801.plot: After his fiancée's daughter dies while in his care, a deaf man shuts himself off from the world. Haunted by memories, it is only through new friendship that he can learn to forgive, love, and reconnect.

4802.name: Agent Cody Banks (2003)
4802.plot: A government agent trains Cody Banks in the ways of covert operations that require younger participants.

4803.name: Ordinary People (1980)
4803.plot: The accidental death of the older son of an affluent family deeply strains the relationships among the bitter mother, the good-natured father and the guilt-ridden younger son.

4804.name: Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels (1998)
4804.plot: Eddy persuades his three pals to pool money for a vital poker game against a powerful local mobster, Hatchet Harry. Eddy loses, after which Harry gives him a week to pay back 500,000 pounds.

4805.name: Harsh Times (2005)
4805.plot: A tough-minded drama about two friends in South Central Los Angeles and the violence that comes between them.

4806.name: Superman Returns (2006)
4806.plot: Superman returns to Earth after spending five years in space examining his homeworld Krypton. But he finds things have changed while he was gone, and he must once again prove himself important to the world.

4807.name: The In-Laws (2003)
4807.plot: Right before his daughter's wedding, a mild-mannered foot doctor discovers that his future son-in-law's father is a free-wheeling international spy.

4808.name: Creature of the Walking Dead (1965)
4808.plot: A mad scientist, who discovered the secret of eternal youth by draining of blood from a young woman, gets executed. His ancestor moves into the home, eventually discovering the scientist's body. He revives him, and the terror continues.

4809.name: Monty Python's Life of Brian (1979)
4809.plot: Born on the original Christmas in the stable next door to Jesus Christ, Brian of Nazareth spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

4810.name: Airplane! (1980)
4810.plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

4811.name: Interstellar (2014)
4811.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

4812.name: Changing Lanes (2002)
4812.plot: A young lawyer and a businessman share a small automobile accident, and their mutual road rage escalates into a feud.

4813.name: The King and I (1956)
4813.plot: A widow accepts a job as a live-in governess to the King of Siam's children.

4814.name: Summer of Sam (1999)
4814.plot: Spike Lee's take on the "Son of Sam" murders in New York City during the summer of 1977 centering on the residents of an Italian-American Northeast Bronx neighborhood who live in fear and distrust of one another.

4815.name: Exposed (2016)
4815.plot: A police detective investigates the truth behind his partner's death. The mysterious case reveals disturbing police corruption and a dangerous secret involving an unlikely young woman.

4816.name: Jackass Presents: Bad Grandpa (2013)
4816.plot: 86-year-old Irving Zisman takes a trip from Nebraska to North Carolina to take his 8 year-old grandson, Billy, back to his real father.

4817.name: Superman: Unbound (2013)
4817.plot: Superman and Supergirl take on the cybernetic Brainiac, who boasts that he possesses "the knowledge and strength of 10,000 worlds."

4818.name: Beyond a Reasonable Doubt (2009)
4818.plot: Remake of the 1956 film noir film "Beyond a Reasonable Doubt" in which a writer's plan to expose a corrupt district attorney takes an unexpected turn.

4819.name: Hatchet (2006)
4819.plot: When a group of tourists in a New Orleans haunted swamp tour find themselves stranded in the wilderness, their evening of fun and spooks turns into a horrific nightmare.

4820.name: The Ex (2006)
4820.plot: A slacker is forced to work for his father-in-law after his pregnant wife steps away from her high-paying job.

4821.name: Fried Green Tomatoes (1991)
4821.plot: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady at a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

4822.name: A Chorus Line (1985)
4822.plot: Hopefuls try out before a demanding director for a part in a new musical.

4823.name: Hide and Seek (2007)
4823.plot: A college professor left Manila with his wife Leah, rebellious stepdaughter Nica and younger stepson Uno after he was blamed for the death of Ella Cabuena, Nica's ...best friend. After moving to an abandoned house, ominous visions and hauntings began to happen in this Philippines Filipino horror story.

4824.name: Zero Dark Thirty (2012)
4824.plot: A chronicle of the decade-long hunt for al-Qaeda terrorist leader Osama bin Laden after the September 2001 attacks, and his death at the hands of the Navy S.E.A.L.s Team 6 in May 2011.

4825.name: A Good Day to Die Hard (2013)
4825.plot: John McClane travels to Russia to help out his seemingly wayward son, Jack, only to discover that Jack is a CIA operative working undercover, causing the father and son to team up against underworld forces.

4826.name: Invasion of the Body Snatchers (1956)
4826.plot: A small-town doctor learns that the population of his community is being replaced by emotionless alien duplicates.

4827.name: Promised Land (2012)
4827.plot: A salesman for a natural gas company experiences life-changing events after arriving in a small town, where his corporation wants to tap into the available resources.

4828.name: Australia (2008)
4828.plot: Set in northern Australia before WWII, an Englishwoman who inherits a sprawling ranch reluctantly pacts with a stock-man in order to drive 2,000 head of cattle over unforgiving landscapes.

4829.name: Field of Dreams (1989)
4829.plot: Iowa farmer Ray Kinsella is inspired by a voice he can't ignore to pursue a dream he can hardly believe. Supported by his wife, Ray begins the quest by turning his ordinary cornfield into a place where dreams can come true.

4830.name: Sister (2015)
4830.plot: Julie Strain is the tyrannical interrogator who commands the dark forces of the future. They abduct an innocent woman played by Heather Baker (Raw Energy) and enslave her inside an invincible steel fortress. Forced to endure mind-shattering torments, she befriends the other female prisoners who commit unspeakable acts in order to survive. Guided by a mysterious spirit...

4831.name: Pompeii (2014)
4831.plot: A slave-turned-gladiator finds himself in a race against time to save his true love, who has been betrothed to a corrupt Roman Senator. As Mount Vesuvius erupts, he must fight to save his beloved as Pompeii crumbles around him.

4832.name: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
4832.plot: After the Kingsman's headquarters are destroyed and the world is held hostage, an allied spy organization in the United States is discovered. These two elite secret agencies must band together to defeat a common enemy.

4833.name: In the Blink of an Eye (2009)

4834.name: I'm a Cyborg, But That's OK (2006)
4834.plot: A girl who thinks she is a combat cyborg checks into a mental hospital, where she encounters other psychotics. Eventually, she falls for a man who thinks he can steal people's souls.

4835.name: Forks Over Knives (2011)
4835.plot: Examines the profound claim that most, if not all, of the degenerative diseases that afflict us can be controlled, or even reversed, by rejecting our present menu of animal-based and processed foods.

4836.name: The Empire Strikes Back (1980)
4836.plot: After the Rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on the ice planet Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

4837.name: Déjà Vu (2006)
4837.plot: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an A.T.F. agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber, but soon finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims.

4838.name: Journey to Italy
4838.plot: An unhappily married couple attempts to find direction and insight while vacationing in Naples.

4839.name: The Bourne Ultimatum (2007)
4839.plot: Jason Bourne dodges a ruthless C.I.A. official and his Agents from a new assassination program while searching for the origins of his life as a trained killer.

4840.name: Police Story 2 (1988)
4840.plot: The Hong Kong supercop must stop a group of blackmailing bombers, while the villains of Ging chaat goo si (1985) are out for revenge.

4841.name: Rio (2011)
4841.plot: When Blu, a domesticated macaw from small-town Minnesota, meets the fiercely independent Jewel, he takes off on an adventure to Rio de Janeiro with the bird of his dreams.

4842.name: The Artist (2011)
4842.plot: An egomaniacal film star develops a relationship with a young dancer against the backdrop of Hollywood's silent era.

4843.name: 2012: Ice Age (2011)
4843.plot: A volcanic eruption in Iceland sends a glacier towards North America, causing everything in it's path to freeze. A family man struggles to escape the onslaught of the coming ice age.

4844.name: Boys Don't Cry (1999)
4844.plot: A young man named Brandon Teena navigates love, life, and being transgender in rural Nebraska.

4845.name: The Hunger (1983)
4845.plot: A love triangle develops between a beautiful yet dangerous vampire (Catherine Deneuve), her cellist companion (David Bowie), and a gerontologist (Susan Sarandon).

4846.name: An Officer and a Gentleman
4846.plot: A young man must complete his work at a Navy Officer Candidate School to become an aviator, with the help of a tough Gunnery Sergeant and his new girlfriend.

4847.name: For the Love of Spock (2016)
4847.plot: An examination of the enduring appeal of Leonard Nimoy and his portrayal of Spock in Star Trek (1966).

4848.name: He Got Game (1998)
4848.plot: A basketball player's father must try to convince him to go to a college so he can get a shorter sentence.

4849.name: Breakfast at Tiffany's (1961)
4849.plot: A young New York socialite becomes interested in a young man who has moved into her apartment building, but her past threatens to get in the way.

4850.name: Gamer (2011)
4850.plot: The boy's name is Alex, but in the world of gamers where he spends most of his time, he is known as Koss. The enormous amount of time he spends at the computer screen starts to pay off: in the games' clubs in his small Ukrainian village, he is the undisputed king of the shooting game Quake, admired by the 'noobs' - the younger and less experienced players he defeats d...

4851.name: Three Colors: Blue (1993)
4851.plot: A woman struggles to find a way to live her life after the death of her husband and child.

4852.name: Meet Dave (2008)
4852.plot: A crew of miniature aliens operate a spaceship that has a human form. While trying to save their planet, the aliens encounter a new problem, as their ship becomes smitten with an Earth woman.

4853.name: Julie (2006)
4853.plot: Julie (Ramya) is a young Christian woman who finds herself pregnant after having sex with Shashi (Dino Morea), a Hindu follower and her childhood sweetheart. Faced with the choice of abortion or carrying the child to term, Julie chooses to keep the pregnancy a secret from Shashi and goes to a convent, where she will deliver the child and put it up for adoption. Afterw...

4854.name: Majestic (2002)
4854.plot: Daasa is an orphan, raised by a corrupt policeman, Ranadheera. who becomes a gangster when he grows up. His life changes when he falls in love with Kiran, his enemy's daughter, who aids him after her father's truth comes to light and rest of the story forms the plot.

4855.name: The American President (1995)
4855.plot: A widowed U.S. President running for reelection and an environmental lobbyist fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception," and sparks fly anyway.

4856.name: Being Elmo: A Puppeteer's Journey (2011)
4856.plot: The Muppet Elmo is one of the most beloved characters among children across the globe. Meet the unlikely man behind the puppet - the heart and soul of Elmo - Kevin Clash.

4857.name: The Pest (1997)
4857.plot: A Miami con man agrees to be the human target for a Neo-Nazi manhunter in order to collect $50,000 if he survives.

4859.name: Neighbor (2009)
4859.plot: A mysterious new girl arrives in posh suburban neighborhood and quickly sets out to terrorize the town. As she starts breaking into homes and torturing the occupants, they begin to realize that she isn't just another girl next door.

4860.name: Vexille
4860.plot: Japan, 2077: A female agent named Vexille is dispatched to Tokyo to investigate whether Japanese are developing robotic technology, which has been banned by the U.N. due to its potential threat to humankind.

4861.name: Babel (2006)
4861.plot: Tragedy strikes a married couple on vacation in the Moroccan desert, touching off an interlocking story involving four different families.

4862.name: Wanderlust (2012)
4862.plot: Rattled by sudden unemployment, a Manhattan couple surveys alternative living options, ultimately deciding to experiment with living on a rural commune where free love rules.

4863.name: Crank: High Voltage (2009)
4863.plot: Chelios faces a Chinese mobster who has stolen his nearly indestructible heart and replaced it with a battery-powered ticker which requires regular jolts of electricity to keep working.

4864.name: Invincible (2001)
4864.plot: A Jewish strongman performs in Berlin as the blond Aryan hero Siegfried.

4865.name: James Bond (2015)
4865.plot: A down-to-earth software employee marries a lady without knowing about her past and criminal activities. Halfway through his marriage, he finds out her background and decides to run away, but ultimately comes to terms with his problems.

4866.name: Lake Placid vs. Anaconda
4866.plot: A giant crocodile goes head to head with a giant anaconda. The town Sheriff must find a way to destroy the two monsters before they kill the whole town.

4867.name: Eyes Wide Shut (1999)
4867.plot: A Manhattan doctor embarks on a bizarre, night-long odyssey after his wife's admission of unfulfilled longing.

4868.name: Funny Girl (1968)
4868.plot: The life of Fanny Brice, famed comedienne and entertainer of the early 1900s. We see her rise to fame as a Ziegfeld girl, subsequent career, and her personal life, particularly her relationship with Nick Arnstein.

4869.name: Adrift (2009)
4869.plot: A 1980s-set drama about a teenage girl undergoing her sexual awakening when she learns about her father's infidelities.

4870.name: Trog (1970)
4870.plot: A sympathetic anthropologist uses drugs and surgery to try to communicate with a primitive troglodyte who is found living in a local cave.

4871.name: The Goods: Live Hard, Sell Hard (2009)
4871.plot: Used-car liquidator Don Ready is hired by a flailing auto dealership to turn their Fourth of July sale into a majorly profitable event.

4872.name: Paul Blart: Mall Cop (2009)
4872.plot: When a shopping mall is taken over by a gang of organized crooks, it's up to a mild-mannered security guard to save the day.

4873.name: Gaslight (1940)
4873.plot: Twenty years after the murder of Alice Barlow, her house is finally occupied again. However, the husband from the couple who have moved in has a secret which he will do anything to keep hidden.

4874.name: Walk Like a Man (1987)
4874.plot: A boy raised by wolves is reunited as an adult with his real family.

4875.name: The Hole (2001)
4875.plot: Four teenagers at a British private school secretly uncover and explore the depths of a sealed underground hole created decades ago as a possible bomb shelter.

4876.name: Grown Ups (2010)
4876.plot: After their high school basketball coach passes away, five good friends and former teammates reunite for a Fourth of July holiday weekend.

4877.name: The Phantom of the Opera (1998)
4877.plot: Gory remake of the Gaston Leroux classic story, only this time, the phantom is not disfigured, but a man who was raised by rats deep under the Paris Opera House.

4878.name: Who Am I (2014)
4878.plot: Benjamin, a young German computer whiz, is invited to join a subversive hacker group that wants to be noticed on the world's stage.

4879.name: Rangoon (2017)
4879.plot: A story about three friends dealing illegal gold trafficking in India and when they think everything is going smoothly their life takes a u-turn when a business deal goes wrong in Rangoon

4880.name: Planes, Trains and Automobiles (1986)
4880.plot: A Chicago advertising man must struggle to travel home from New York for Thanksgiving, with a lovable oaf of a shower curtain ring salesman as his only companion.

4881.name: Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (2009)
4881.plot: A local scientist is often regarded as a failure until he invents a machine that can make food fall from the sky. But little does he know, that things are about to take a turn for the worst.

4882.name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead (1991)
4882.plot: Five siblings are left alone all summer when their mom leaves town and the evil babysitter bites the dust.

4883.name: Get Rich or Die Tryin' (2005)
4883.plot: A tale of an inner city drug dealer who turns away from a life of crime to pursue his passion of rap music.

4884.name: Kick-Ass (2010)
4884.plot: Dave Lizewski is an unnoticed high school student and comic book fan who one day decides to become a superhero, even though he has no powers, training or meaningful reason to do so.

4885.name: Home Alone 4
4885.plot: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

4886.name: Blades of Glory (2007)
4886.plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

4887.name: Flawless (1999)
4887.plot: An ultraconservative security guard suffers a debilitating stroke and is assigned to a rehabilitative program that includes singing lessons, with the drag queen next door.

4888.name: Total Recall (1990)
4888.plot: When a man goes in to have virtual vacation memories of the planet Mars implanted in his mind, an unexpected and harrowing series of events forces him to go to the planet for real - or is he?

4889.name: Brick Mansions (2014)
4889.plot: An undercover Detroit cop navigates a dangerous neighborhood that's surrounded by a containment wall with the help of an ex-con in order to bring down a crime lord and his plot to devastate the entire city.

4890.name: Barbarella (1968)
4890.plot: Barbarella, an astronaut from the 41st century, sets out to find and stop the evil scientist Durand Durand, whose Positronic Ray threatens to bring evil back into the galaxy.

4891.name: Ontmaskerd (1915)
4891.plot: The story revolves around extortion and blackmail, in which a known impostor makes the lives of the others impossible.

4892.name: Big Eden (2000)
4892.plot: Big Eden is a small, fictional northwestern Montana town.

4893.name: Beyond Skyline
4893.plot: A tough-as-nails detective embarks on a relentless pursuit to free his son from a nightmarish alien warship.

4894.name: Courageous (2011)
4894.plot: When a tragedy strikes close to home, four police officers struggle with their faith and their roles as husbands and fathers. Together they make a decision that will change all of their lives.

4895.name: Revenge of the Nerds II: Nerds in Paradise (1987)
4895.plot: The rising college nerds set out to a convention in Florida, but are not welcomed by the Alpha Beta representatives.

4896.name: The Wood (1999)
4896.plot: While dealing with a friend's cold feet on his wedding day, a writer reminisces about his youth with his best friends.

4897.name: Alila (2003)
4897.plot: Slice-of-life look at the lives of twelve people who live or work in the same apartment complex in Tel Aviv.

4898.name: Running with Scissors (2006)
4898.plot: Young Augusten Burroughs absorbs experiences that could make for a shocking memoir: the son of an alcoholic father and an unstable mother, he's handed off to his mother's therapist, Dr. Finch, and spends his adolescent years as a member of Finch's bizarre extended family.

4899.name: The Ninth Configuration (1980)
4899.plot: A former marine arrives at a mental asylum housed in a remote castle to run it. There he attempts to rehabilitate the patients by letting them act out their craziest fantasies and desires.

4900.name: Superman III (1983)
4900.plot: Synthetic kryptonite laced with tar splits Superman in two: good Clark Kent and bad Man of Steel.

4901.name: Rear Window (1954)
4901.plot: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his Greenwich Village courtyard apartment window, and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder, despite the skepticism of his fashion-model girlfriend.

4902.name: Popeye (1980)
4902.plot: The adventures of the famous sailor man and his friends in the seaside town of Sweethaven.

4903.name: Batman Begins
4903.plot: After training with his mentor, Batman begins his fight to free crime-ridden Gotham City from corruption.

4904.name: Heat (1996)
4904.plot: First time out of Michigan, Lily starts art school in LA and shares a house with other young artistic people. Both her teacher and a roomie/classmate show interest in her.

4905.name: For Love of the Game (1999)
4905.plot: After 19 years of playing the game he's loved his whole life, Detroit Tigers pitcher Billy Chapel has to decide if he's going to risk everything and put everything out there.

4906.name: The Expendables 2 (2012)
4906.plot: Mr. Church reunites the Expendables for what should be an easy paycheck, but when one of their men is murdered on the job, their quest for revenge puts them deep in enemy territory and up against an unexpected threat.

4907.name: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time (2010)
4907.plot: A young fugitive prince and princess must stop a villain who unknowingly threatens to destroy the world with a special dagger that enables the magic sand inside to reverse time.

4909.name: Houston, We Have a Problem! (2016)
4909.plot: Explores the myth of the secret multi-billion-dollar deal behind America's purchase of Yugoslavia's clandestine space program in the early 1960s.

4910.name: The Negotiator (1998)
4910.plot: In a desperate attempt to prove his innocence, a skilled police negotiator accused of corruption and murder takes hostages in a government office to gain the time he needs to find the truth.

4911.name: The Alamo (2004)
4911.plot: Based on the 1836 standoff between a group of Texan and Tejano men, led by Davy Crockett and Jim Bowie, and Mexican dictator Santa Anna's forces at the Alamo in San Antonio Texas.

4912.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles (2014)
4912.plot: When a kingpin threatens New York City, a group of mutated turtle warriors must emerge from the shadows to protect their home.

4913.name: Everybody Wants Some!! (2016)
4913.plot: In 1980, a group of college baseball players navigate their way through the freedoms and responsibilities of unsupervised adulthood.

4914.name: Oldboy (2003)
4914.plot: After being kidnapped and imprisoned for fifteen years, Oh Dae-Su is released, only to find that he must find his captor in five days.

4915.name: Evil Dead Trap 3: Broken Love Killer (1993)
4915.plot: A policewoman is investigating the apparent suicide of a college coed. The prime suspects include the girl's professor, who may have been having an affair with her and the professor's wife, who frequents lesbian bars.

4916.name: Alice Through the Looking Glass (2016)
4916.plot: Alice is appointed to save her beloved Mad Hatter from deadly grief by travelling back to the past, but this means fatally harming Time himself, the noble clockwork man with the device needed to save the Hatter's family from the Red Queen.

4917.name: Witching & Bitching (2013)

To bring in bad name to police power Th...

But the contempt He perceives as a Muslim immigrant to the UK causes him t...

Will he get succeeded with his love forms the rest of the ...

So Mimi decides to get a job as an illustrator at the New York Chronicle where her friend Jimmy works. When Alan and Liz return from their honeymoon, Alan wants to keep Mimi at h...

The US Army officially claims he was radicalized and "went native", joining the Viet Cong and later encountering the Khmer Rouge. In 2006, retired US Army Lt. Dan Smith, revisiting the ba...

She's always wanted a perfect marriage, but ended up with a track record of failed relationships. When she strikes up a romance with the wealthy Ted, a guy she grew up admiring from afar, and says yes to ma...

5601.plot: A beautiful girl attends a royal ball where she meets the love of her life and must then fight for it.

Big feels the wind stronger than ever before while he...

But something is not right about the ...

5626.name: F (2010)
5626.plot: A group of teachers must defend themselves from a gang of murderous youths when their school comes under siege after hours.

5627.plot: Working as security guards, Craig and Day-Day run into the thief who stole their Christmas presents.

Pharaoh Ramses II decrees the death of all Hebrew children, but Moses, placed in a basket in the Nile by his mother, is taken by a royal Princess and raised as the brother of the heir to the throne of Egypt, Mermefta. Moses is called by God to lead his people from Egypt to the promised land. A very reluctant prophet, feeling unworthy of...

When he reaches the church someone else has run off with his bride. He then replaces them with Mazda lights and is able to track down and reclaim his bride.

5665.plot: Johnny's the top high-school football player and many colleges want him. His girlfriend, coach and best friend want him in the college, serving themselves most.

He soon loses everything in a cards game, so the stallion ends up in the Hackensc...

The woman, forbidden to marry and thereby involve outsiders in the factory ownership, finds herself drawn to the headstrong painter. When they f...

Then nine residents, which include Juzaburo, hatch a scheme to improve their lots by running a pawn and loan business with the proceeds being distributed among the townfolk. However, the plan is risky with such commerce and profiteering being frowned upon in a society with a ...

While she is in the house, she experiences terrible visions of faces screaming - are these ghosts, or unclear memories from her own past? The situation continues to deteriorate, until it looks as though Pet...

5756.plot: A police officer promises to share his lottery ticket with a waitress in lieu of a tip.

5775.name: The New Swiss Family Robinson (1998)
5775.plot: When Angelino Jack Robinson gets a new job in Australia, he decides to take his wife Anna, sons Shane and Todd, and daughter Elisabeth 'Lizzy' by sailing yacht from Hong Kong to Sydney. The gun he gets, thrown in by Sheldon Blake, proves disabled, and for a sinister reason: near Borneo, Blake's men turn up to capture them. The family escapes but loses the yacht on a r...

5776.name: Bananas (1971)
5776.plot: When a bumbling New Yorker is dumped by his activist girlfriend, he travels to a tiny Latin American nation and becomes involved in its latest rebellion.

5777.name: Five Shaolin Masters (1974)

Being fat isn't easy, and he secretly admires young socialite columnist Ninia, who gets the shock of her life when she sees Macky in his 300-pound glory. Macky hires Aira as his personal trainer, and as he loses weight, he and Aira gain love and affection for each other. But soon after, Aira accepts...

5795.name: Sleeping Beauty (1995)

5809.plot: Mickey and all his friends hold their own Christmas party at the House of Mouse, after being snowed in.

5810.plot: February 12 is just another day in Sam's charmed life, until it turns out to be her last. Stuck reliving her last day over and over, Sam untangles the mystery around her death and discovers everything she's losing.

This isolated land, dominated by rituals and patriarchal relationships is the spirit that welcomes the newborn child of Abas. Servet, a co-villager, emigrant in the United States of America comes back in his homeland bringing a new vision and a new mentality, which serves as an inspiration for the 10...

5815.plot: Diana, without her father knowing it, trains as a boxer and achieves impressive success, blazing new trails for female boxers.

South African-born attorney Sarah Barcant, meanwhile, returns to her homeland to represent Mpondo, as well as Steve Sizela, Mpondo's friend who was arrested along with him a...

W - If Woman is one of the words which comes to your mind, this movie is for you!

Open-minded, ambitious Sandhya Singh a.k.a Sandy (Leeza Mangaldas); Traditional, romantic Roohi Malik (Lezlie Tripathy) and Rebellious, lesbian (gay) Manu (Sonal Giani) are musicians & best friends forever (BFF) who run an event management company called W.

6092.plot: In a small town is Villa Villekulla, and in the villa has recently a little girl, Pippi Longstocking, moved in with her horse and her little monkey Herr Nilsson.

6093.name: Teen Witch (1989)
6093.plot: High school misfit Louise, at a loss for romance, discovers magical abilities, but the teenage witch finds that she cannot conjure herself true love, so what?

6094.name: Crooklyn (1994)
6094.plot: Spike Lee's vibrant semi-autobiographical portrait of a school teacher, her stubborn jazz musician husband and their five kids living in Brooklyn in 1973.

6098.name: Man with a Movie Camera (1929)
6098.plot: A man travels around a city with a camera slung over his shoulder, documenting urban life with dazzling invention.

6099.plot: A salvage crew discovers a long-lost 1962 passenger ship floating lifeless in a remote region of the Bering Sea, and soon notices that its long-dead inhabitants may still be on board.

6100.name: The Perfect Storm (2000)
6100.plot: An unusually intense storm pattern catches some commercial fishermen unaware and puts them in mortal danger.

6101.name: Doctor Strange (2016)
6101.plot: While on a journey of physical and spiritual healing, a brilliant neurosurgeon is drawn into the world of the mystic arts.

6102.name: My Dog Skip (2000)

The dilemma of choosing between his career and the truth weighs heavily on his shoulders. Looking further to solve the case, he enters a danger zone paved with unexpected and painful revelations.

6104.name: Chicken Run (2000)
6104.plot: When a cockerel apparently flies into a chicken farm, the chickens see him as an opportunity to escape their evil owners.

6105.name: Piranha (1978)
6105.plot: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a summer resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

6106.name: She-Devil (1989)
6106.plot: A surprisingly resourceful housewife vows revenge on her husband when he begins an affair with a wealthy romance novelist.

6108.plot: A waterboy for a college football team discovers he has a unique tackling ability and becomes a member of the team.

6110.plot: When a senator's daughter under Secret Service protection is kidnapped from a private school, detective Alex Cross investigates the case even though he's recovering from the loss of his partner.

6111.name: Meet the Parents (2010)
6111.plot: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

6112.plot: 5 young Norwegians head up to the mountains to snowboard. One breaks his leg and it's getting dark soon, so they spend the night in a big, abandoned hotel, closed 30 years ago. They are not alone.

6114.plot: When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.

6115.plot: A trio of young men (Griffin, Anderson, and Imperioli) are forced to grow up quick when their girlfriends all become pregnant around the same time.

His beloved sister Christina, who went from greatness to decay as the famous porn-star The Princess, is dead after years of drug abuse. She leaves behind her 5-year old daughter Mia, whom August feels obliged to take care of. Weighed down by grief...

6123.plot: George Banks must deal not only with his daughter's pregnancy, but also with his wife's.

6124.plot: A spoof of Robin Hood in general, and Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves (1991) in particular.

After growing to an adult and learning about his origins and powers, he goes to the city in search of his school sweetheart, Gita, who has become a newspaper reporter. At the same time, Verma, Shekhar's rival for Gita's affection in the...

6195.plot: On a journey to find the cure for a Tatarigami's curse, Ashitaka finds himself in the middle of a war between the forest gods and Tatara, a mining colony. In this quest he also meets San, the Mononoke Hime.

Drugs and violence controlled the streets, taking a toll on the city's law enforcement, neighborhoods and its people. Illustrating this dark chapter in the city's history is "Death Toll".

6202.plot: A documentary that investigates incidents of hunger experienced by millions of Americans, and proposed solutions to the problem.

6210.plot: A homicidal turkey axes off college kids during Thanksgiving break.

6211.name: One of Us (1989)
6211.plot: A few Palestinian guerilla's break into an Israeli camp in the occupied territories. They kill a few Israeli soldiers before they are killed, apart from one who dies in the camp after being captured alive. The Israeli military despatch an investigator to the camp to see if there was cold blooded murder (people at the camp had claimed he was shot while trying to escape...

6212.name: The Edge (1997)
6212.plot: An intellectual billionaire and two other men struggle to band together and survive after getting stranded in the Alaskan wilderness with a blood-thirsty Kodiak Bear hunting them down.

6213.plot: In 1892, a legendary Army Captain reluctantly agrees to escort a Cheyenne chief and his family through dangerous territory.

6216.plot: A group of bad cops look to dispose of a body that one of them accidentally shot.

6217.plot: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape from Earth and return to his home planet.

6218.plot: When the alpha male at an all-gay loft complex winds up dead, only one friend, believing it's murder, hires a P.I. to look into it.

6220.plot: A car thief (Michal Nemtuda) tries to change his lifestyle when he finds romance with a beautiful collegian (Kristína Svarinská).

6221.plot: A linguistics professor and her family find their bonds tested when she is diagnosed with Alzheimer's Disease.

6225.plot: A man returns to college and is talked into joining he football team and is a real joke on the team, until he is given a drug that gives him super strength.

When he returns home that night, however, he finds her laying dead on the floor. In a panic he buries her body deep in the woods and tries to return to his ordinary life. One day, he thinks he spots ...

6231.name: Daddy's Home (2015)
6231.plot: Brad Whitaker is a radio host trying to get his stepchildren to love him and call him Dad. But his plans turn upside down when their biological father, Dusty Mayron, returns.

6232.name: The Strangers in the House
6232.plot: Hector Loursat, attorney at law, lives with his daughter Nicole in a vast and shabby mansion in this provincial town. They dont talk to each other much, somehow holding the other one responsible for the situation: Hector Loursat used to be one of the great attorneys until his wife left him for another man eighteen years ago. He has been drinking ever since, and given ...
