6241.plot: Seven gunmen from a variety of backgrounds are brought together by a vengeful young widow to protect her town from the private army of a destructive industrialist.

6242.name: The Last Temptation of Christ (1988)
6242.plot: The life of Jesus Christ, his journey through life as he faces the struggles all humans do, and his final temptation on the cross.

6243.name: Our House (2006)
6243.plot: A lonely socialite (Roberts) opens up her mansion to homeless people after a young woman (Reyes) saves her life.

6244.name: So I Married an Axe Murderer (1993)
6244.plot: A San Francisco poet who fears commitment suspects his girlfriend may have a knack for killing off her significant others.

6245.name: Cartel Land (2015)
6245.plot: Filmmaker Matthew Heineman examines the state of the ongoing drug problem along the U.S.-Mexican border.

6246.name: Pleasantville (1998)
6246.plot: Two 1990s teenage siblings find themselves in a 1950s sitcom, where their influence begins to profoundly change that complacent world.

6247.name: Road House (1989)
6247.plot: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

6248.name: Irreplaceable (2016)
6248.plot: After a doctor is diagnosed with cancer, a new doctor joins him to help him treat his rural patients.

6249.name: Dirty Dancing: Havana Nights
6249.plot: High school senior Katey moves to Havana in November 1958, when her dad gets a promotion at Ford. She meets a local waiter, who introduces her to sensual Cuban music/dance. They enter a big dance contest for the prize when he gets fired.

6250.name: Air Bud: World Pup (2000)
6250.plot: A boy and his dog take on the world of soccer.

6252.name: Night of the Demon (1957)
6252.plot: Ten teenagers party at an abandoned funeral parlor on Halloween night. When an evil force awakens, demonic spirits keep them from leaving and turn their gathering into a living Hell.

6253.name: The Rocky Horror Picture Show (1975)
6253.plot: A newly-engaged couple have a breakdown in an isolated area and must seek shelter at the bizarre residence of Dr. Frank-n-Furter.

6254.name: The Darjeeling Limited (2007)
6254.plot: A year after their father's funeral, three brothers travel across India by train in an attempt to bond with each other.

6255.name: Noah (2014)
6255.plot: Noah is chosen by God to undertake a momentous mission before an apocalyptic flood cleanses the world.

6256.name: The Taking of Pelham One Two Three (1974)
6256.plot: Four armed men hijack a New York City subway car and demand a ransom for the passengers. The city's police are faced with a conundrum: Even if it's paid, how could they get away?

6257.name: The Blob (1988)
6257.plot: A deadly entity from space crashes near a small town and begins consuming everyone in its path. Panic ensues as shady government scientists try to contain the horrific creature.

6258.name: When in Rome (2002)
6258.plot: Twins are hired as interns at an international fashion company in Rome. They unjustly get fired by Tortoni but rehired by the Ozzie owner. They meet the owner's nephew and a Roman guy. Is romance in their future?

6259.name: CQ (2001)
6259.plot: A young filmmaker in 1960s Paris juggles directing a cheesy sci-fi debacle, directing his own personal art film, coping with his crumbling relationship with his girlfriend, and realizing that he's infatuated with the sci-fi film's starlet.

6260.name: Dogville (2003)
6260.plot: A woman on the run from the mob is reluctantly accepted in a small Colorado community in exchange for labor, but when a search visits the town she finds out that their support has a price.

6261.name: Equilibrium (2002)
6261.plot: In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.

6262.name: The Sound of Music (1965)
6262.plot: A young novitiate is sent by her convent in 1930s Austria to become a governess to the seven children of a widowed naval officer.

6263.name: Crimson Peak (2015)
6263.plot: In the aftermath of a family tragedy, an aspiring author is torn between love for her childhood friend and the temptation of a mysterious outsider. Trying to escape the ghosts of her past, she is swept away to a house that breathes, bleeds - and remembers.

6264.name: Moms' Night Out (2014)
6264.plot: Hardworking mom Allyson has a crazy night out with her friends, while their husbands watch their children.

6265.name: Harry Potter
6265.plot: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.

6266.name: Notorious (2009)
6266.plot: The life and death story of The Notorious B.I.G. (a.k.a. Christopher Wallace), who came straight out of Brooklyn to take the world of rap music by storm.

6268.name: Rebel Without a Cause (1955)
6268.plot: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.

6269.name: The Blob (1958)
6269.plot: An alien lifeform consumes everything in its path as it grows and grows.

6270.name: Signs (2008)
6270.plot: After his fiancée's daughter dies while in his care, a deaf man shuts himself off from the world. Haunted by memories, it is only through new friendship that he can learn to forgive, love, and reconnect.

6271.name: White Fang (1991)
6271.plot: Jack London's classic adventure story about the friendship developed between a Yukon gold hunter and the mixed dog-wolf he rescues from the hands of a man who mistreats him.

6272.name: The Hobbit: The Desolation of Smaug (2013)
6272.plot: The dwarves, along with Bilbo Baggins and Gandalf the Grey, continue their quest to reclaim Erebor, their homeland, from Smaug. Bilbo Baggins is in possession of a mysterious and magical ring.

6273.name: Justice League: The Flashpoint Paradox
6273.plot: The Flash finds himself in a war torn alternate timeline and teams up with alternate versions of his fellow heroes to return home and restore the timeline.

6274.name: Waterboys (2001)
6274.plot: In a Japanese high school, a class of adolescent geeks joins the new synchronized swimming teacher and takes up the challenge to take part in the competition, in spite of the mockeries of the "real sportsmen".

6275.name: Annie (1999)
6275.plot: Jake Muss' oldest son is killed in a gang fight and the younger son wants revenge, but Jake doesn't want to lose his other son to violence as well.

6276.name: Stronger
6276.plot: Stronger is the inspiring real life story of Jeff Bauman, an ordinary man who captured the hearts of his city and the world to become a symbol of hope after surviving the 2013 Boston Marathon bombing.

6277.name: Radio (2003)
6277.plot: The story of a high school coach and the developmentally challenged man who he took under his wing.

6278.name: Blood Diamond (2006)
6278.plot: A fisherman, a smuggler, and a syndicate of businessmen match wits over the possession of a priceless diamond.

6279.name: The Ruins (2008)
6279.plot: A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse when a group of friends and a fellow tourist embark on a remote archaeological dig in the jungle, where something evil lives among the ruins.

6280.name: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them (2016)
6280.plot: The adventures of writer Newt Scamander in New York's secret community of witches and wizards seventy years before Harry Potter reads his book in school.

6281.name: Awakenings (1990)
6281.plot: The victims of an encephalitis epidemic many years ago have been catatonic ever since, but now a new drug offers the prospect of reviving them.

6282.name: Happy People: A Year in the Taiga (2010)
6282.plot: A documentary depicting the life and work of the trappers of Bakhtia, a village in the heart of the Siberian Taiga, where daily life has changed little in over a century.

6283.name: The Candidate (2008)
6283.plot: Defense attorney Jonas Bechmann is a man of the system--until the day he himself is accused of murder. Taking matters into his own hands, he throws himself into the hunt for a group of blackmailers who threaten to expose him as the killer. But nothing is what it appears to be, and the blackmail links back to his father's death under mysterious circumstances 18 months ...

6284.name: Psycho (1960)
6284.plot: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.

6285.name: Trolls (2016)
6285.plot: After the Bergens invade Troll Village, Poppy, the happiest Troll ever born, and the curmudgeonly Branch set off on a journey to rescue her friends.

6286.name: Antz (1998)
6286.plot: A rather neurotic ant tries to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

6287.name: Into the Storm (2014)
6287.plot: Storm trackers, thrill-seekers, and everyday townspeople document an unprecedented onslaught of tornadoes touching down in the town of Silverton.

6288.name: Prison Break: The Final Break
6288.plot: Michael and Sara wed, but the happiness is short-lived when the Feds apprehend her for the murder of Michael's mother, Christina. Once a hit is ordered on Sara, the team reunite to break out the increasingly vulnerable target.

6289.name: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason (2004)
6289.plot: After finding love, Bridget Jones questions if she really has everything she'd ever dreamed of having.

6290.name: Ali G Indahouse (2002)
6290.plot: Ali G unwittingly becomes a pawn in the Chancellor's plot to overthrow the Prime Minister of Great Britain. However, Ali is embraced by the nation as a voice of the youth, making the PM and his government more popular than ever.

6291.name: Shakespeare in Love (1998)
6291.plot: The world's greatest ever playwright, William Shakespeare, is young, out of ideas and short of cash, but meets his ideal woman and is inspired to write one of his most famous plays.

6292.name: The Actors (2003)
6292.plot: Two failed actors decide to pull a con on a local gangster by pretending to be the people to whom he owes money.

6293.name: Meet the Blacks (2016)
6293.plot: As Carl Black gets the opportunity to move his family out of Chicago in hope of a better life, their arrival in Beverly Hills is timed with that city's annual purge, where all crime is legal for twelve hours.

6294.name: Harvey (1950)
6294.plot: Due to his insistence that he has an invisible six foot-tall rabbit for a best friend, a whimsical middle-aged man is thought by his family to be insane - but he may be wiser than anyone knows.

6295.name: Dracula A.D. 1972 (1972)
6295.plot: Johnny Alucard raises Count Dracula from the dead in London in 1972. The Count goes after the descendants of Van Helsing.

6296.name: The Constant Gardener (2005)
6296.plot: A widower is determined to get to the bottom of a potentially explosive secret involving his wife's murder, big business, and corporate corruption.

6297.name: Man on the Moon (1999)
6297.plot: The life and career of legendary comedian Andy Kaufman.

6298.name: New Year's Eve (2002)
6298.plot: The lives of several couples and singles in New York City intertwine over the course of New Year's Eve.

6299.name: Lawless (2012)
6299.plot: Set in Depression-era Franklin County, Virginia, a trio of bootlegging brothers are threatened by a new special deputy and other authorities angling for a cut of their profits.

6300.name: The Twilight Saga
6300.plot: After the birth of Renesmee/Nessie, the Cullens gather other vampire clans in order to protect the child from a false allegation that puts the family in front of the Volturi.

6301.name: Hanna (2011)
6301.plot: A sixteen-year-old girl who was raised by her father to be the perfect assassin is dispatched on a mission across Europe, tracked by a ruthless intelligence agent and her operatives.

6302.name: Message in a Bottle (1999)
6302.plot: A woman discovers a tragic love letter in a bottle on a beach, and is determined to track down its author.

6303.name: This Christmas (2007)
6303.plot: A Christmastime drama centered around the Whitfield family's first holiday together in four years.

6304.name: Bride Wars (2015)
6304.plot: A pair of brides-to-be put their friendship to the test when they battle it out for the perfect wedding scheduled on the same day.

6305.name: American Psycho (2000)
6305.plot: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive, Patrick Bateman, hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his co-workers and friends as he delves deeper into his violent, hedonistic fantasies.

6306.name: Grown Ups 2 (2013)
6306.plot: After moving his family back to his hometown to be with his friends and their kids, Lenny finds out that between old bullies, new bullies, schizo bus drivers, drunk cops on skis, and four hundred costumed party crashers sometimes crazy follows you.

6307.name: Bad Words (2013)
6307.plot: A spelling bee loser sets out to exact revenge by finding a loophole and attempting to win as an adult.

6308.name: The Man Who Knew Too Little (1997)
6308.plot: Wallace Ritchie is mistaken for a spy and must stop a plot to assassinate international leaders at a banquet.

6309.name: The Gold Rush (1925)
6309.plot: A prospector goes to the Klondike during the 1890s gold rush in hopes of making his fortune, and is smitten with a girl he sees in a dance hall.

6311.name: Underworld (2003)
6311.plot: Selene, a vampire warrior, is entrenched in a conflict between vampires and werewolves, while falling in love with Michael, a human who is sought by werewolves for unknown reasons.

6312.name: Police Academy 2: Their First Assignment (1985)
6312.plot: When a new gang moves into town it's up to the screwball police team to stop them.

6313.name: Everything You Always Wanted to Know About Sex* (1972)
6313.plot: Seven stories are trying to answer the question: what is sex? Or maybe they are not trying.

6314.name: Maurice (1987)
6314.plot: After his lover rejects him, a young man trapped by the oppressiveness of Edwardian society tries to come to terms with and accept his sexuality.

6315.name: The Perfect Guy (2015)
6315.plot: After breaking up with her boyfriend, a professional woman gets involved with a man who seems almost too good to be true.

6316.name: The Wolfman (2010)
6316.plot: Upon his return to his ancestral homeland, an American man is bitten and subsequently cursed by a werewolf.

6317.name: Cloud Atlas (2012)
6317.plot: An exploration of how the actions of individual lives impact one another in the past, present and future, as one soul is shaped from a killer into a hero, and an act of kindness ripples across centuries to inspire a revolution.

6318.name: The Howling: Reborn (2011)
6318.plot: A teenage outcast discovers he is a werewolf, and must battle a pack of the brutal creatures when they threaten him and his new girlfriend.

6319.name: Dulha Mil Gaya (2010)
6319.plot: A man marries so he can inherit his father's wealth.

6320.name: Treasure Island (1972)
6320.plot: Young Jim Hawkins has an unforgettable encounter with pirate Captain Long John Silver and his murderous mates.

6321.name: Return of the Jedi (1983)
6321.plot: After a daring mission to rescue Han Solo from Jabba the Hutt, the Rebels dispatch to Endor to destroy the second Death Star. Meanwhile, Luke struggles to help Darth Vader back from the dark side without falling into the Emperor's trap.

6322.name: The Imaginarium of Doctor Parnassus (2009)
6322.plot: A traveling theater company gives its audience much more than they were expecting.

6323.name: The Wicker Man (1973)
6323.plot: A puritan Police Sergeant arrives in a Scottish island village in search of a missing girl, who the Pagan locals claim never existed.

6325.name: Cop (1988)
6325.plot: An obsessive, insubordinate homicide cop is convinced a serial killer is loose in the Hollywood area and disobeys orders in order to catch him.

6326.name: Hollywood Shuffle (1987)
6326.plot: An actor limited to stereotypical roles because of his ethnicity, dreams of making it big as a highly respected performer. As he makes his rounds, the film takes a satiric look at African American actors in Hollywood.

6327.name: Mary Shelley's Frankenstein (1994)
6327.plot: When the brilliant but unorthodox scientist Dr. Victor Frankenstein rejects the artificial man that he has created, the Creature escapes and later swears revenge.

6328.name: Doctor Zhivago (1965)
6328.plot: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.

6329.name: Gangs of Wasseypur (2012)
6329.plot: A clash between Sultan and Shahid Khan leads to the expulsion of Khan from Wasseypur, and ignites a deadly blood feud spanning three generations.

6330.name: The Fog of War (2003)
6330.plot: The story of America as seen through the eyes of the former Secretary of Defense under President John F. Kennedy and President Lyndon B. Johnson, Robert McNamara.

6331.name: Step Up Revolution (2012)
6331.plot: Emily arrives in Miami with aspirations to become a professional dancer. She sparks with Sean, the leader of a dance crew whose neighborhood is threatened by Emily's father's development plans.

6332.name: Big Eyes (2014)
6332.plot: A drama about the awakening of painter Margaret Keane, her phenomenal success in the 1950s, and the subsequent legal difficulties she had with her husband, who claimed credit for her works in the 1960s.

6333.name: Conspiracy Theory (1997)
6333.plot: A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.

6334.name: Madea's Tough Love (2015)
6334.plot: Madea stars in her first animated movie! With her hilarious mix of sass and wisdom, Madea proves that behind her tough exterior is a whole lot of love.

6335.name: Hot Pursuit (2015)
6335.plot: An uptight and by-the-book cop (Reese Witherspoon) tries to protect the outgoing widow (Sofia Vergara) of a drug boss as they race through Texas pursued by crooked cops and murderous gunmen.

6336.name: Django Unchained (2012)
6336.plot: With the help of a German bounty-hunter, a freed slave sets out to rescue his wife from a brutal plantation-owner in Mississippi.

6337.name: Pi (1998)
6337.plot: A paranoid mathematician searches for a key number that will unlock the universal patterns found in nature.

6338.name: Inconceivable (2008)
6338.plot: A satirical drama about the test-tube baby industry.

6339.name: Mean Girls 2
6339.plot: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.

6340.name: Arsenic and Old Lace
6340.plot: A Brooklyn writer of books on the futility of marriage risks his reputation when he decides to tie the knot. Things get even more complicated when he learns on his wedding day that his beloved maiden aunts are habitual murderers.

6341.name: Jacob's Ladder (1990)
6341.plot: Mourning his dead child, a haunted Vietnam War veteran attempts to uncover his past while suffering from a severe case of dissociation. To do so, he must decipher reality and life from his own dreams, delusions, and perceptions of death.

6342.name: Comrades: Almost a Love Story (1996)
6342.plot: Two Chinese-mainlanders living in Hong Kong form a close friendship. Over the years this grows into love, but there are obstacles.

6343.name: Predator 2 (1990)
6343.plot: The Predator returns to Earth, this time to stake a claim on the war-torn streets of a dystopian Los Angeles.

6344.name: Mobile Suit Gundam F91
6344.plot: After a generation of peace, the Earth Federation's new space colonies becomes a battlefield. To save his friends and family, the reluctant warrior Seabook Arno becomes the pilot of a new Gundam which bears the code name F91.

6345.name: Dressed to Kill (1980)
6345.plot: A mysterious blonde woman kills one of a psychiatrist's patients, and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder.

6346.name: The Man Without a Face (1993)
6346.plot: Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then he finds out the disfigured recluse living nearby is an ex-teacher.

6347.name: Home Alone (1990)
6347.plot: An eight-year-old troublemaker must protect his house from a pair of burglars when he is accidentally left home alone by his family during Christmas vacation.

6348.name: Where the Buffalo Roam (1980)
6348.plot: Semi-biographical film based on the experiences of gonzo journalist Hunter S. Thompson.

6349.name: JFK (1991)
6349.plot: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

6350.name: Evil Bong (2006)
6350.plot: Straight-laced nerd Alistair moves into a college dorm with hardcore marijuana users Brett, Larnell, and Bachman. Larnell orders an old giant bong that proves to have strange magical powers. When smoked said bong sends a person to a bizarre drugged-out alternate realm from which there is no easy escape.

6351.name: Meatballs (1979)
6351.plot: Wacky hijinks of counselors and campers at a less-than-average summer camp.

6352.name: Love in the Afternoon (1957)
6352.plot: A middle-aged playboy becomes fascinated by the daughter of a private detective who has been hired to entrap him with the wife of a client.

6353.name: Twister (1989)
6353.plot: Delusional and spoiled Maureen and her eccentric brother Howdy decide to track down and meet their estranged mother, all while the drama of dysfunctional relationships, disastrous weather conditions and a dark family secret ensue.

6354.name: The Last Escape (2010)
6354.plot: During the final days of WW2, an Allied commando team races toward a German rocket base to abduct a Nazi scientist before the fast advancing Soviet troops could reach him.

6355.name: The Code (2001)
6355.plot: Finnish-made documentary about GNU/Linux, featuring some of the most influential people of the free software (FOSS) movement.

6356.name: Air Force One (1997)
6356.plot: Communist radicals hijack Air Force One with the U.S. President and his family on board. The Vice President negotiates from Washington D.C., while the President, a veteran, fights to rescue the hostages on board.

6357.name: 35 and Ticking (2011)
6357.plot: A romantic comedy which looks at a group of thirty-somethings trying to figure out life, love and marriage.

6359.name: Oliver & Company
6359.plot: A lost and alone kitten joins a gang of dogs engaged in petty larceny in New York City.

6360.name: Bound (1996)
6360.plot: Tough ex-con Corky and her lover Violet concoct a scheme to steal millions of stashed mob money and pin the blame on Violet's crooked boyfriend Caesar.

6361.name: Beyond the Law (1992)
6361.plot: A former mobster turned businessman and a police detective must contend with a dirty ex-cop looking to bring the killer of his son to justice.

6362.name: Hood 2 Hood: The Blockumentary (2005)
6362.plot: Hood 2 Hood, The Blockumentary is an action packed film that takes you on a tour through America's highest crime rated neighborhoods- hoods across the country from California to New York, to the South and Midwest. Their connections opened the doors to their hoods and allowed them to capture the day-to-day actions of life in the crime-infested neighborhoods.

6363.name: The Interview (2014)
6363.plot: Dave Skylark and his producer Aaron Rapaport run the celebrity tabloid show "Skylark Tonight". When they land an interview with a surprise fan, North Korean dictator Jong-Un Kim, they are recruited by the CIA to assassinate him.

6364.name: Kazaam (1996)
6364.plot: A troubled kid inadvertently releases a genie, who must grant him any three wishes he requests.

6365.name: The Visit (2000)
6365.plot: A young man dying in prison brings his family together for a fateful visit, and proceeds to put his life back together.

6366.name: Shanghai Noon (2000)
6366.plot: A Chinese man travels to the Wild West to rescue a kidnapped Princess. After teaming up with a train robber, the unlikely duo takes on a Chinese traitor and his corrupt boss.

6367.name: Weekend at Bernie's (1989)
6367.plot: Two idiots try to pretend that their murdered employer is really alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

6368.name: Mom
6368.plot: After her daughter is sexually assaulted at a party, a furious mother sets out to destroy the lives of the four perpetrators who walked away free.

6369.name: Good Boy! (2003)
6369.plot: Two loose-cannon narcotics cops investigate the flow of Ecstasy into Florida from a Cuban drug cartel.

6370.name: Rush Hour 2 (2001)
6370.plot: Carter and Lee head to Hong Kong for a vacation, but become embroiled in a counterfeit money scam.

6371.name: Seeking a Friend for the End of the World (2012)
6371.plot: As an asteroid nears Earth, a man finds himself alone after his wife leaves in a panic. He decides to take a road trip to reunite with his high school sweetheart. Accompanying him is a neighbor who inadvertently puts a wrench in his plan.

6372.name: Central Intelligence (2016)
6372.plot: After he reconnects with an awkward pal from high school through Facebook, a mild-mannered accountant is lured into the world of international espionage.

6373.name: You Were Never Really Here
6373.plot: A traumatized veteran unafraid of violence tracks down missing girls for a living. When a job spins out of control, Joe's nightmares overtake him as a conspiracy is uncovered leading to what could be his death trip or his awakening.

6374.name: Sharp Shooter (2015)
6374.plot: JK, an unemployed man, falls in love with Nandini, a lawyer. Everything in his life changes after he is mistaken for a serial killer.

6375.name: Tenacious D in The Pick of Destiny (2006)
6375.plot: To become the greatest band of all time, two slacker, wannabe-rockers set out on a quest to steal a legendary guitar pick that gives its holders incredible guitar skills, from a maximum security Rock and Roll museum.

6376.name: Barbershop
6376.plot: A day in the life of a South Side Chicago barbershop.

6377.name: Six Reasons Why (2008)
6377.plot: In a desolate place called the Badlands, four men stand off with guns drawn, their fingers ready at the trigger.

6378.name: Heaven Is for Real (2014)
6378.plot: A small-town father must find the courage and conviction to share his son's extraordinary, life-changing experience with the world.

6379.name: Oh, God! (1977)
6379.plot: When God appears to an assistant grocery manager as a good natured old man, the Almighty selects him as his messenger for the modern world.

6380.name: Indecent Proposal (1993)
6380.plot: A billionaire offers $1,000,000 to a young married couple for one night with the wife.

6381.name: Independence Day (1983)
6381.plot: Mary Ann Taylor of Mercury, Texas loves the comforts of her hometown, but feels unfulfilled by a life of pouring coffee and grilling hamburgers in her father's diner. Her real passion is photography, but pursuing her dream of becoming a photographer means leaving Mercury. Despite her desperation to expand her horizons, Mary Ann hesitates to leave because of her mother...

6382.name: 2001: A Space Odyssey
6382.plot: After uncovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, a spacecraft is sent to Jupiter to find its origins - a spacecraft manned by two men and the supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.

6383.name: Cool World (1992)
6383.plot: When Jack Deebs was behind bars he found escape by creating Cool World, a cartoon series featuring a vixen named Holli Would. The flesh proves weaker than ink, however, as Holli takes human form in Las Vegas.

6384.name: Super Mario Bros. (1993)
6384.plot: Two Brooklyn plumbers, Mario and Luigi, must travel to another dimension to rescue a princess from the evil dictator King Koopa and stop him from taking over the world.

6385.name: Taking Chance (2009)
6385.plot: A troubled town is having an Indian casino built on a historic battlefield. Chase, working at the town museum, opposes it. He meets the cute Lucy. They start a petition against the casino.

6386.name: Y Tu Mamá También (2001)
6386.plot: In Mexico, two teenage boys and an attractive older woman embark on a road trip and learn a thing or two about life, friendship, sex, and each other.

6387.name: The Grapes of Wrath (1940)
6387.plot: An Oklahoma family, driven off their farm by the poverty and hopelessness of the Dust Bowl, joins the westward migration to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.

6389.name: Open Water (2003)
6389.plot: Based on the true story of two scuba divers accidentally stranded in shark infested waters after their tour boat has left.

6390.name: The Emperor's New Clothes (1966)
6390.plot: During Napoleon's exile on St. Helena, some loyalists hire a look-alike to swap places with the deposed Emperor. While the impostor lives in luxury on the island, the real Napoleon returns to Paris in order to retake the throne.

6391.name: Next (2007)
6391.plot: A Las Vegas magician who can see into the future is pursued by FBI agents seeking to use his abilities to prevent a nuclear terrorist attack.

6392.name: The Best Exotic Marigold Hotel
6392.plot: British retirees travel to India to take up residence in what they believe is a newly restored hotel. Less luxurious than advertised, the Marigold Hotel nevertheless slowly begins to charm in unexpected ways.

6393.name: Little Voice (1998)
6393.plot: A shy reclusive lady is convinced by an invisible entity to sing. Subsequently, she finds herself noticed by a sleazy talent agent and her talent being showcased on-stage. She also meets a kind but nervous man who becomes her best friend.

6394.name: You Can't Take It with You (1938)
6394.plot: The son of a snobbish Wall Street banker becomes engaged to a woman from a good-natured but decidedly eccentric family, not realizing that his father is trying to force her family from their home for a real estate development.

6395.name: Inside Out (2011)
6395.plot: A man is released from prison after serving a long time for killing a man who tried to kill his best friend. Once out, he just wants to live a normal life, but his best friend immediately gets him into a new heap of serious troubles.

6396.name: Star Wars: Episode VIII – The Last Jedi (2017)
6396.plot: The Star Wars saga continues as new heroes and galactic legends go on an epic adventure, unlocking mysteries of the Force and shocking revelations of the past.

6397.name: Aladin (2009)
6397.plot: Since he was a child, Aladin Chatterjee has been teased for his fairytale name. As a college student he follows his namesake's footsteps; unleashing genie Genius and wooing exchange student Jasmine. But the evil Ringmaster approaches.

6398.name: Night of the Living Dead (1990)
6398.plot: When the unburied dead return to life and seek human victims, seven refugees seek shelter in a house in the Pennsylvanian countryside, but the group is at odds as to how they should deal with the situation.

6399.name: Bulletproof (1996)
6399.plot: Two criminals, Keats and Moses, end their friendship, when Keats turns out to be an undercover cop. Many years later, the two are forced to work together when Keats is assigned to protect Moses as a witness.

6400.name: Any Given Sunday (1999)
6400.plot: A behind-the-scenes look at the life-and-death struggles of modern-day gladiators and those who lead them.

6401.name: Butterfly on a Wheel (2007)
6401.plot: A perfect family's dynamic is ruined by a kidnapper's brutally efficient plot.

6402.name: I Am Number Four (2011)
6402.plot: Aliens and their Guardians are hiding on Earth from intergalactic bounty hunters. They can only be killed in numerical order, and Number Four is next on the list. This is his story.

6403.name: Population 436 (2006)
6403.plot: A census-taker (Sisto) is sent to investigate why a certain small town has had the same population -- 436 residents -- for the last 100 years.

6404.name: Digimon: The Movie
6404.plot: Throughout three different stories, Kari Kamiya and her friends take on explosive adventures involving digital creatures.

6405.name: In Harm's Way (1965)
6405.plot: A Naval officer, reprimanded after Pearl Harbor, is later promoted to Rear Admiral and gets a second chance to prove himself against the Japanese.

6406.name: Beginners
6406.plot: A young man is rocked by two announcements from his elderly father: that he has terminal cancer and that he has a young male lover.

6407.name: Police Story 3: Super Cop (1992)
6407.plot: A Hong Kong detective teams up with his female Red Chinese counterpart to stop a Chinese drug czar.

6408.name: Once Upon a Time in America (1984)
6408.plot: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan 35 years later, where he must once again confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

6409.name: Madea Goes to Jail (2009)
6409.plot: Mischievous grandma Madea lands in jail, where she meets a variety of mixed-up characters.

6410.name: Max Steel (2016)
6410.plot: The adventures of teenager Max McGrath and his alien companion, Steel, who must harness and combine their tremendous new powers to evolve into the turbo-charged superhero Max Steel.

6411.name: Loved (1997)
6411.plot: After a husband is accused of driving his third wife to suicide, his first wife Hedda, a troubled woman who can't hate or hurt others even if they had wronged her, is subpoenaed to testify on his abusive behavior during their marriage.

6412.name: Free State of Jones (2016)
6412.plot: A disillusioned Confederate army deserter returns to Mississippi and leads a militia of fellow deserters and women in an uprising against the corrupt local Confederate government.

6413.name: Student Bodies (1981)
6413.plot: A serial killer with his signature heavy breathing proceeds to systematically kill the students and teachers of Lamab high school.

6414.name: Ninja (2009)
6414.plot: A westerner named Casey, studying Ninjutsu in Japan, is asked by the Sensei to return to New York to protect the legendary Yoroi Bitsu, an armored chest that contains the weapons of the last Koga Ninja.

6415.name: Seven Years in Tibet (1997)
6415.plot: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

6416.name: Mishima: A Life in Four Chapters (1985)
6416.plot: A fictionalized account in four chapters of the life of celebrated Japanese writer Yukio Mishima.

6417.name: Mickey (2004)
6417.plot: A widowed lawyer wanted by the IRS assumes a new identity and signs his now-too-old son up for one more year of Little League. However, this may have been a mistake, as his son's dominance captures the media's attention as his team careens toward the Little League World Series.

6418.name: Parents (1989)
6418.plot: A young boy living in 1950s suburbia suspects his parents are cannibalistic murderers.

6420.name: Pokémon 4Ever (2001)
6420.plot: Ash must stop a hunter who forces the mythical Pokémon Celebi to help him destroy a forest.

6421.name: Kramer vs. Kramer
6421.plot: After his wife leaves him, a work-obsessed Manhattan advertising executive is forced to learn long-neglected parenting skills, but a heated custody battle over the couple's young son deepens the wounds left by the separation.

6422.name: A Bug's Life (1998)
6422.plot: A misfit ant, looking for "warriors" to save his colony from greedy grasshoppers, recruits a group of bugs that turn out to be an inept circus troupe.

6423.name: Eight Men Out (1988)
6423.plot: A dramatization of the Black Sox scandal when the underpaid Chicago White Sox accepted bribes to deliberately lose the 1919 World Series.

6424.name: Freejack (1992)
6424.plot: Bounty hunters from the future transport a doomed race car driver to New York City in 2009, where his mind will be replaced with that of a dead billionaire.

6425.name: Mac & Devin Go to High School (2012)
6425.plot: A comedy that follows two high school students -- one overachiever struggling to write his valedictorian speech, the other a senior now going on his 15th year of school.

6426.name: Certified Copy (2010)
6426.plot: In Tuscany to promote his latest book, a middle-aged British writer meets a French woman who leads him to the village of Lucignano. While there, a chance question reveals something deeper.

6427.name: Paper Towns (2015)
6427.plot: After an all-night adventure, Quentin's lifelong crush, Margo, disappears, leaving behind clues that Quentin and his friends follow on the journey of a lifetime.

6428.name: Joy (2015)
6428.plot: Joy is the story of the title character, who rose to become founder and matriarch of a powerful family business dynasty.

6429.name: The Breed (2006)
6429.plot: A group of five college kids are forced to match wits with unwelcoming residents when they fly to a "deserted" island for a party weekend.

6430.name: Holiday Affair (1949)
6430.plot: A young widow is torn between a boring attorney and a romantic ne'er-do-well.

6431.name: Shin Godzilla (2016)
6431.plot: Japan is plunged into chaos upon the appearance of a giant monster.

6432.name: Turner & Hooch (1989)
6432.plot: A detective must adopt a rambunctious dog in order to help him find a killer.

6433.name: An American Werewolf in London (1981)
6433.plot: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

6434.name: The Enemy (1979)
6434.plot: A remote mountainous region is terrorized by a legendary monster that regularly abducts newlywed brides and kills them.

6435.name: Machete (2010)
6435.plot: After being set-up and betrayed by the man who hired him to assassinate a Texas Senator, an ex-Federale launches a brutal rampage of revenge against his former boss.

6436.name: Godzilla Against Mechagodzilla (2002)
6436.plot: A new Godzilla causes the JSDF to construct a cyborg countermeasure from the original monster's remains. The beast's restless soul is discovered to inhabit the machine as the pilot must learn to find value in her own life.

6437.name: The Running Man (1987)
6437.plot: In a dystopian America, a falsely convicted policeman gets his shot at freedom when he must forcibly participate in a TV game show where convicts, runners, must battle killers for their freedom.

6438.name: 2001: A Space Travesty (2000)
6438.plot: Marshal Dix is to free US president from aliens on the int'l lunar base. A clone has replaced him in The White House. Can Dix prevent an alien invasion?

6439.name: Route 666 (2001)
6439.plot: A federal witness runs away and a team of government agents track him down, but when they take a shortcut on the return trip, they're attacked by zombies.

6440.name: Niagara (1953)
6440.plot: As two couples are visiting Niagara Falls, tensions between one wife and her husband reach the level of murder.

6441.name: Lego Indiana Jones and the Raiders of the Lost Brick
6441.plot: Archaeology professor Indiana Jones ventures to seize a biblical artefact known as the Ark of the Covenant. While doing so, he puts up a fight against Renee and a troop of Nazis.

6442.name: Ali (2001)
6442.plot: A biography of sports legend Muhammad Ali, focusing on his triumphs and controversies between 1964 and 1974.

6443.name: Daddy Day Care (2003)
6443.plot: Two men named Charlie Hinton and Phil Ryerson get laid off and have to become stay-at-home fathers when they can't find jobs. This inspires them to open their own day care center.

6444.name: The Lovers (2017)
6444.plot: Debra Winger and Tracy Letts play a long-married, dispassionate couple who are both in the midst of serious affairs. But on the brink of calling it quits, a spark between them suddenly reignites, leading them into an impulsive romance.

6445.name: The Gumball Rally (1976)
6445.plot: An eclectic group of people takes part in a secret, and illegal, cross country road race.

6447.name: 13 Ghosts (1960)
6447.plot: A family inherits what proves to be a haunted house, but a special pair of goggles allows them to see their ghostly tormentors.

6448.name: Cabaret (1972)
6448.plot: A female girlie club entertainer in Weimar Republic era Berlin romances two men while the Nazi Party rises to power around them.

6449.name: The Imposter (2012)
6449.plot: A documentary centered on a young man in Spain who claims to a grieving Texas family that he is their 16-year-old son who has been missing for 3 years.

6450.name: Slutty Summer (2004)
6450.plot: Hunky writer Markus returns home to find his boyfriend of four years naked with another man. Newly single, he begins waiting tables at a swinging Chelsea hotspot where the indelible supporting cast of co-workers offers conflicting directions on the off-road map to love and lust in New York City. Peter insists on holding out for "the one", and Marilyn vows by her "dati...

6451.name: Oliver! (1968)
6451.plot: After being sold to a mortician, young orphan Oliver Twist runs away and meets a group of boys trained to be pickpockets by an elderly mentor in 1830s London.

6452.name: The Notebook (2013)
6452.plot: Twin siblings enduring the harshness of WWII in a village on the Hungarian border hedge their survival on studying and learning from the evil surrounding them.

6453.name: Sixty Million Dollar Man (1995)
6453.plot: A rich playboy gets blown up by a gangster when he flirts with the gangster's wife. Through a series of circumstances, his professor makes him a synthetic body that allows him to change into anything he wants.

6455.name: Dr. Seuss' How the Grinch Stole Christmas (2000)

6456.name: Pippi Longstocking (1997)
6456.plot: Pippi is a little girl who lives alone in her house, while her father is sailing the seas. With Pippi we meet her horse, her monkey and her two friends Tommy and Anika. Together they go on many journeys through the neighborhood.

6457.name: Into the Woods (2014)
6457.plot: A witch tasks a childless baker and his wife with procuring magical items from classic fairy tales to reverse the curse put on their family tree.

6458.name: The Girl Next Door (2007)
6458.plot: Follows the unspeakable torture and abuses committed on a teenage girl in the care of her aunt and the boys who witness and fail to report the crime.

6459.name: The Secret Life of Pets (2016)
6459.plot: The quiet life of a terrier named Max is upended when his owner takes in Duke, a stray whom Max instantly dislikes.

6460.name: Pokémon: The Movie 2000 (1999)
6460.plot: Ash Ketchum must gather the three spheres of fire, ice and lightning in order to restore balance to the Orange Islands.

6461.name: Silence (2016)
6461.plot: In the 17th century, two Portuguese Jesuit priests travel to Japan in an attempt to locate their mentor, who is rumored to have committed apostasy, and to propagate Catholicism.

6462.name: Argo (2004)
6462.plot: The crew of Tibi Balogh sets out on a journey across Hungary to get the ancient Gold Owl statue, as well as the Milk Man. The treasure is worth millions, who gets there first?

6463.name: Attack of the 50 Foot Woman (1958)
6463.plot: When an abused socialite grows to giant size because of an alien encounter and an aborted murder attempt, she goes after her cheating husband with revenge on her mind.

6464.name: Exit Wounds (2001)
6464.plot: Orin Boyd, a tough cop in an inner-city precinct discovers a web of dirty cops and corruption.

6465.name: The Science of Sleep (2006)
6465.plot: A man entranced by his dreams and imagination is love-struck with a French woman and feels he can show her his world.

6466.name: Dave (1993)
6466.plot: An uncanny Presidential lookalike named Dave is recruited by the Secret Service to become a momentary stand-in for the President of the United States.

6467.plot: A New York City narcotics detective reluctantly agrees to cooperate with a special commission investigating police corruption, and soon realises he's in over his head, and nobody can be trusted.

6468.plot: Chris Nielsen dies in an accident, and enters Heaven. But when he discovers that his beloved wife Annie has killed herself out of grief over the loss, he embarks on an afterlife adventure to reunite with her.

6469.plot: An English Duke from 1876 is inadvertedly dragged to modern day New York where he falls for a plucky advertising executive.

6470.name: The Emerald Forest (1985)
6470.plot: After the son of engineer Bill Markham is abducted by an aboriginal tribe on the edge of the rain forest, the engineer spends the next 10 years searching for him.

6474.name: Blade II (2002)
6474.plot: Blade forms an uneasy alliance with the vampire council in order to combat the Reapers, who are feeding on vampires.

6476.plot: Under the Athenian night sky, before the silent threat of an imminent socio-economic crisis, a young man goes for a stroll and meets the love of his life. Does fate govern one's existence? What would have happened if he stayed in, instead?

6477.plot: A young CIA agent is tasked with looking after a fugitive in a safe house. But when the safe house is attacked, he finds himself on the run with his charge.

6478.plot: An anarchist trip through the modern world. This satire on power, money, ideologies and social conventions renounces traditional storytelling in order to experiment with cinematic form and language.

6479.name: 8mm (1999)
6479.plot: A private investigator is hired to discover if a "snuff film" is authentic or not.

6480.name: Sister Act 2: Back in the Habit (1993)
6480.plot: Showgirl Deloris Van Cartier returns as Sister Mary Clarence to teach music to a group of Catholic students whose run-down school is slated for closure.

6481.name: Carrie (1952)
6481.plot: A young girl from a provincial town learns the bitter reality of a big city and great love.

6482.name: I Am Thor (2015)
6482.plot: Jon Mikl Thor was a bodybuilding, steel bending, brick smashing rock star in the 70's and 80's whose theatrical band, Thor, never quite made it big. Years later he attempts a comeback that nearly kills him.

6483.name: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind (2004)
6483.plot: When their relationship turns sour, a couple undergoes a medical procedure to have each other erased from their memories.

6484.name: Paris When It Sizzles (1964)
6484.plot: The sprightly young assistant of a Hollywood screenwriter helps him over his writer's block by acting out his fantasies of possible plots.

6485.name: Horrible Bosses (2011)
6485.plot: Three friends conspire to murder their awful bosses when they realize they are standing in the way of their happiness.

6486.name: That Awkward Moment (2014)
6486.plot: Three best friends find themselves where we've all been - at that confusing moment in every dating relationship when you have to decide "So...where is this going?"

6487.name: How the Grinch Stole Christmas (2018)
6487.plot: On the outskirts of Whoville lives a green, revenge-seeking Grinch who plans to ruin Christmas for all of the citizens of the town.

6488.name: Earth Girls Are Easy (1989)
6488.plot: A Southern California girl befriends three furry aliens after their spaceship lands in her swimming pool.

6489.plot: The only residents of young Nicholas' sea-side town are women and boys. When he sees a corpse in the ocean one day, he begins to question his existence and surroundings. Why must he, and all the other boys, be hospitalised?

6490.name: Terminator Salvation (2009)
6490.plot: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

6491.name: The Girl on the Train (2009)
6491.plot: A drama centered on a young woman who claims she was the target of an anti-Semetic attack and the subsequent media sensation it creates.

6492.name: The Seven Year Itch (1955)
6492.plot: When his family goes away for the summer, a hitherto faithful husband with an overactive imagination is tempted by a beautiful neighbbor.

6493.name: Marilyn (2011)
6493.plot: A bank robber on the lam reluctantly takes a runaway young woman under his wing. Distracted by this volatile girl, he struggles to keep his head in the game and stay under the legal radar, but her dreams of becoming a singer sidetrack his plans and change him irrevocably. Filmed in a gritty 1970s style. Marilyn is based on a story written in Leavenworth Prison by Padd...

6494.name: Once (2007)
6494.plot: A modern-day musical about a busker and an immigrant and their eventful week in Dublin, as they write, rehearse and record songs that tell their love story.

6495.name: Monster (2003)
6495.plot: Based on the life of Aileen Wuornos, a Daytona Beach prostitute who became a serial killer.

6496.name: Demain tout commence (2016)
6496.plot: A bachelor enjoys his sweet life on the French Riviera until a one-night stand tells him, he's dad to Gloria and leaves her with him. He moves to London with Gloria. Mom turns up 8 years later.

6497.name: Encounters of the Spooky Kind (1980)
6497.plot: Impoverished teahouse worker (and martial-arts student) Abao is engaged to his boss' daughter, Little Chu, and fights to protect her from the lecherous advances of the wealthy but repulsive Master Shi. The two men's romantic rivalry escalates into full-scale supernatural warfare after Shi enlists the aid of a wicked sorcerer, and Abao encounters a benevolent female gh...

6499.name: The Bandit (1996)
6499.plot: Baran the Bandit, released from prison after 35 years, searches for vengeance and his lover.

6500.name: Phase IV (1974)
6500.plot: Desert ants suddenly form a collective intelligence and begin to wage war on the inhabitants. It is up to two scientists and a stray girl they rescue from the ants to destroy them.

6501.name: Dance Me to My Song (1998)
6501.plot: The wheelchair-bound Julia (Heather Rose), who cannot walk, feed or dress herself, communicates via her computerized electronic voice synthesizer. Her sympathetic lesbian sister Rix (Rena Owen) is not in a position to take care of her sibling's needs. Instead, Julia depends on an abusive, short-tempered caretaker Madelaine (Joey Kennedy), who calls her a "spastic," ab...

6502.name: The Accountant (2016)
6502.plot: As a math savant uncooks the books for a new client, the Treasury Department closes in on his activities, and the body count starts to rise.

6503.name: The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari (1920)
6503.plot: Hypnotist Dr. Caligari uses a somnambulist, Cesare, to commit murders.

6504.name: Hotel Transylvania 2 (2015)
6504.plot: Dracula and his friends try to bring out the monster in his half human, half vampire grandson in order to keep Mavis from leaving the hotel.

6505.plot: Space radiation turns the dead into Zombies. Zomcon fights zombies and finds ways to pacify and use them. On pre-teen Timmy's (Kesun Loder's) 1950s suburban street, they all have a zombie doing menial chores. Timmy's zombie becomes his pet and friend, and is named Fido (Sir Billy Connolly).

6506.name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom (1984)
6506.plot: A skirmish in Shanghai puts archaeologist Indiana Jones, his partner Short Round and singer Willie Scott crossing paths with an Indian village desperate to reclaim a rock stolen by a secret cult beneath the catacombs of an ancient palace.

6507.name: The Lodger (2009)
6507.plot: A couple rents out a room to a mysterious young man, who may or may not be guilty of a series of grisly neighborhood murders.

6508.name: Existenz (1999)
6508.plot: A game designer on the run from assassins must play her latest virtual reality creation with a marketing trainee to determine if the game has been damaged.

6509.name: Dumb and Dumber
6509.plot: After a woman leaves a briefcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to Aspen to return it.

6510.name: Risky Business (1939)
6510.plot: Radio commentator Dan Clifford takes desperate chances to save the life of a young girl who has been kidnapped.

6511.name: Battle of the Sexes (2017)
6511.plot: The true story of the 1973 tennis match between World number one Billie Jean King and ex-champ and serial hustler Bobby Riggs.

6512.name: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows – Part 1 (2010)
6512.plot: As Harry, Ron and Hermione race against time and evil to destroy the Horcruxes, they uncover the existence of the three most powerful objects in the wizarding world: the Deathly Hallows.

6513.name: The English Patient (1996)

6514.name: Matilda (1996)
6514.plot: A girl gifted with a keen intellect and psychic powers uses both to deal with her crude, distant family and free her kind teacher from their sadistic headmistress.

6515.name: Old Boys: The Way of the Dragon
6515.plot: Facing life difficulties, Wang and Xiao decided abandon everything to chase down their dream, they left for New York to join US TV show, but involved in the gang fight by default.

6516.name: Mystic River (2003)
6516.plot: The lives of three men who were childhood friends are shattered when one of them has a family tragedy.

6517.name: A Dangerous Man (2009)
6517.plot: An anxiety ridden husband learns the art of lucid dreaming, discovering the freedom to explore his erotic side without guilt, but when he takes it too far, he finds himself in a living nightmare of betrayal and murder.

6518.name: Foodfight! (2012)
6518.plot: The evil Brand X joins a supermarket that becomes a city after closing time.

6519.name: Enemy at the Gates (2001)
6519.plot: A Russian and a German sniper play a game of cat-and-mouse during the Battle of Stalingrad.

6520.name: Soul Surfer (2011)
6520.plot: Teenage surfer Bethany Hamilton overcomes the odds and her own fears of returning to the water after losing her left arm in a shark attack.

6521.name: A Far Off Place (1993)
6521.plot: When a gang of African poachers raid her family's farm, young Nonni, visiting American teenager Harry Winslow and a local bushman guide must escape into the Kalahari desert and reach the nearest town.

6522.name: Faces of Death (1978)
6522.plot: A collection of death scenes, ranging from TV material to homemade super 8 movies.

6524.name: A Fish Called Wanda (1988)
6524.plot: In London, four very different people team up on a jewel heist, then try to double-cross one another for the loot, complicated by their efforts to fool a very proper barrister.

6525.name: Spamalot
6525.plot: Musical based on "Monty Python and the Holy Grail"

6526.name: Inferno (2016)
6526.plot: When Robert Langdon wakes up in an Italian hospital with amnesia, he teams up with Dr. Sienna Brooks and they race across Europe together against the clock to foil a deadly global plot.

6527.name: Only You (1994)
6527.plot: As a teen, Faith was told that her destiny is a man named Damon Bradley. Years later - Faith is about to marry another man - a Damon Bradley calls to wish them all the best. Faith blows off the wedding and follows Damon to Italy.

6528.name: Leprechaun 3 (1995)
6528.plot: An evil leprechaun finds himself in Las Vegas, where he proceeds to cause mischief by killing people, granting twisted wishes, and infecting a young man with his green blood.

6529.name: Hard Eight (1996)
6529.plot: Professional gambler Sydney teaches John the tricks of the trade. John does well until he falls for cocktail waitress Clementine.

6530.name: Just Visiting (2001)
6530.plot: A French count is in England to marry the princess. She's killed. A wizard helps him time travel back before the murder - but ends up in Chicago, April 2000. A descendant helps him. Can he return to the 1100s?

6531.name: Bad Girls (1994)
6531.plot: Four prostitutes join together to travel the Old West.

6532.name: A Few Good Men (1992)
6532.plot: Military lawyer Lieutenant Daniel Kaffee defends Marines accused of murder. They contend they were acting under orders.

6533.name: Bridge of Spies (2015)
6533.plot: During the Cold War, an American lawyer is recruited to defend an arrested Soviet spy in court, and then help the CIA facilitate an exchange of the spy for the Soviet captured American U2 spy plane pilot, Francis Gary Powers.

6534.name: Iron Man (1931)
6534.plot: Prizefighter Mason loses his opening fight so wife Rose leaves him for Hollywood. Without her around Mason trains and starts winning. Rose comes back and wants Mason to dump his manager Regan and replace him with her secret lover Lewis.

6535.name: Excalibur (1981)
6535.plot: Merlin the magician helps Arthur Pendragon unite the Britons around the Round Table of Camelot, even as dark forces conspire to tear it apart.

6536.name: Ace Ventura
6536.plot: A goofy detective specializing in animals goes in search of the missing mascot of the Miami Dolphins.

6537.name: Burlesque (2010)
6537.plot: A small-town girl ventures to Los Angeles and finds her place in a neo-burlesque club run by a former dancer.

6538.name: The Skulls (2000)
6538.plot: A senior at an ivy league college, who depends on scholarships and working on the side, gets accepted into the secret society The Skulls. He hopes it betters chances at Harvard but The Skulls is not what he thought and comes at a price.

6539.name: Eddie and the Cruisers II: Eddie Lives! (1989)
6539.plot: A Montreal construction worker joins a band and turns out to be a long-lost rock star from 1960s New Jersey - none other than Eddie Wilson, who mysteriously disappeared after a road accident.

6540.name: Dr. Who and the Daleks (1965)
6540.plot: An eccentric inventor and his companions travel in his TARDIS to the Planet Skaro and battle the evil menace of the Daleks.

6541.name: The Night of the Devils (1972)
6541.plot: Medieval knights executed for their black magic rituals come back as zombies to torment a group of vacationing college kids.

6542.name: Miracle (2004)
6542.plot: The true story of Herb Brooks, the player-turned-coach who led the 1980 U.S. Olympic hockey team to victory over the seemingly invincible Soviet squad.

6543.name: Halloween (1978)
6543.plot: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois to kill again.

6544.name: The Nazis Strike (1943)

Sixty years...
